data.comment: The match has started at Studenternas IP.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
In the minute 2, Sirius are coming forward and Nahom Girmai gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Helsingborg territory.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 9, Brandur Hendriksson for Helsingborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 10, Daniel Jarl (Sirius) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 12, Yukiya Sugita for Sirius is whistled offside.
Helsingborg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sirius.
Mohammed Abubakari (Helsingborg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 15, Sirius take a 1-0 lead thanks to Stefano Vecchia.
Elias Andersson (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Tim Bjorkstrom (Sirius) has received a first yellow card.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Sirius a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Nahom Girmai puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Mohammed Saeid.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Helsingborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
Helsingborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, Free kick Sirius.
Sirius's Stefano Vecchia misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 29, Helsingborg drive forward but Rasmus Jonsson is judged offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Helsingborg's area.
In the minute 30, Alexander Nilsson has recovered and rejoins the match in Uppsala.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Uppsala to check on Alexander Nilsson, who is grimacing with pain.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Helsingborg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 35, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Axel Bjornstrom (Sirius) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
In the minute 38, Sirius's Nahom Girmai gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Helsingborg defender.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Helsingborg.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Helsingborg in Uppsala.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Helsingborg.
In the minute 42, Brandur Hendriksson is booked for the away team.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Yukiya Sugita's header is off-target for Sirius.
In the minute 44, Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Uppsala.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Sirius defence as Brandur Hendriksson fires in a strike for Helsingborg.
Daniel Jarl returns to the field for Sirius after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Attention is being given to Sirius’s Daniel Jarl and play has been suspended briefly.
The second half has started at Studenternas IP.
In Uppsala, Alex Timossi Andersson of Helsingborg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 46, Alhaji Gero (Helsingborg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 46, Olof Mellberg is making the team's first substitution at Studenternas IP with Alhaji Gero replacing Brandur Hendriksson.
Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a first substitution, with Hjalmar Ekdal replacing Tim Bjorkstrom.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Goal! Sirius extend their lead to 3-0 through Nahom Girmai.
In the minute 50, Great play from Stefano Vecchia to set up the goal.
Helsingborg push forward at Studenternas IP and Alhaji Gero gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sirius defence.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
In the minute 52, Free kick in a good position for Sirius!
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
Throw-in Helsingborg.
In the minute 56, In Uppsala Helsingborg drive forward through Rasmus Jonsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 57, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 60, At Studenternas IP, Nahom Girmai has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
The away team replace Joseph Ceesay with Anders Randrup.
In the minute 62, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Sirius.
Adam Stahl is replacing Elias Andersson for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anders Randrup (Helsingborg) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 66, Mohammed Al-Hakim blows against Sirius's Adam Stahl for offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Sirius’s Stefano Vecchia is on his feet again at Studenternas IP.
Mohammed Al-Hakim waits before resuming play because Stefano Vecchia for Sirius is still down.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
The away team have replaced Max Svensson with Noel Mbo. This is the third substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
Alex Timossi Andersson keeps Helsingborg’s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 3-1.
Alhaji Gero instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 70, Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a third change, with Johan Karlsson replacing the possibly injured Stefano Vecchia.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Sirius a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Helsingborg's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 75, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Helsingborg close to the penalty box.
Helsingborg drive upfield and Alex Timossi Andersson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sirius defender.
Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 76, The match at Studenternas IP has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mohammed Saeid, who is down injured.
Sirius's Mohammed Saeid looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Helsingborg's half?
In the minute 78, Nahom Girmai (Sirius) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sirius's Yukiya Sugita attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Sirius in the half of Helsingborg.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick Sirius.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Alex Timossi Andersson with Casper Widell. This is the fourth substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
Ludvig Carlius is replacing Armin Gigovic for the away team.
Sirius make their fourth substitution with Laorent Shabani replacing Yukiya Sugita.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Helsingborg's area.
In the minute 84, Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
Helsingborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 85, Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Helsingborg's half?
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 88, Rasmus Jonsson of Helsingborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Alhaji Gero (Helsingborg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 89, Sirius have a goal kick.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Helsingborg.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Studenternas IP.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
Helsingborg's Mix Diskerud is on target but unsuccessful.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Sirius just outside Helsingborg's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
